citation: Proclamation under the Collections for Charities Act 2001 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Collections for Charities Act 2001

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Collections for Charities Act 2001 fix 1 October 2001 as the day on which that Act commences.

10 September 2001

G. S. M. Green

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. J. Patmore

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 19 September 2001

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
